content: Do we already have tendsto (λ n : ℕ, (2 : ℕ) ^ n) at_top at_top? Or with 2 replaced by any natural greater than one (I only need 2 though)? I checked specific_limits and only saw versions where the base was real, and I specifically need ℕ → ℕ.
I can prove it myself using tendsto_at_top_at_top_of_monotone, but I thought it might exist already.
You might like to know that it's a direct consequence of the fact that it is strictly monotone and ℕ-valued.
Don't know how I missed that in my searching before. Thanks.
Jireh Loreaux has marked this topic as resolved.
